titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: This resolution elects Representative Thomas R. Suozzi (New York) to the Committee on the Budget; Representative Kweisi Mfume (Maryland) to the Committee on Foreign Affairs; and Representative Christopher R. Deluzio (Pennsylvania) to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
